item.title: Camera/Audio
item.description: Camera/Audio # Use when you want to record your face and voice during recording. For first time use, browser will ask you for camera access. Please choose Allow on every visit

item.title: Configure frame
item.description: Configure frame # Allow author to arrange component position on screen, when to display, and how to display Demo:

item.title: Cut video
item.description: Cut video # Allow author to cut a part of recorded video. Demo:

item.title: Initialize workspace
Initialize workspace
item.description: Workspace # Workspace is a folder in your machine disk that containing cherry studio record files, media files, … We only have one workspace used at a time. Initialize # Init workspace from empty folder Go to dashboard and click Init workspace . Then choose empty folder Init workspace from existing workspace folder Go to dashboard and click Init workspace . Then choose a folder having init.csow file inside.

item.title: Intoduction
item.description: Introduction # Cherry studio tool # Cherry studio is a powerful tool to create media content that make things easier, more effective, focus on coding tutorial helpers. See [Guidelines] See demo How it works # Right after you grant Cherry Studio to access a disk folder in your computer, we can store workspace data there including files/folder related to your recording material thanks to modern javascript FileSystemAPI. We only have access to workspace folder, we CAN’T access outside of it.

item.title: Media file
item.description: Media file # Use this to insert mp4 or mp3 media file.

item.title: Media file
item.description: Note # Insert note as annotation to give more information for your video. For e.g you may want to give a link or a text to describe the code

item.title: Preview
item.description: Preview # After you stopped recording, at session page, click Preview In preview page we can: Foresee how components are displayed Configure frame: arrange components, setup when display components. Cut video: Cut components from second to second

item.title: Remark
item.description: Remark # Use this to mark specific timestamps in video, similar to Youtube Chapter When play, audience will see like this:

item.title: Screen
item.description: Screen # Use this to record changes in your IDE Supported IDE # For now, only Vscode Preparation # download extension here install: code --install-extension cherry-vsc-recorder.vsix then follow the rest instruction Demo # https://youtu.be/8QC6vB-UNus

item.title: Screen
item.description: Screen # You can use this to capture the a browser, or any application running in your machine or entire screen. Note** Only can add maximum 3 screens at the same time. No restriction on how many screen in total during recording. For first time use, browser will ask you for camera access. Please choose Allow on every visit

item.title: Terminal
item.description: Terminal # Use this to record your terminal content Preparation # If you don’t have pipx installed, follow this guideline install cherryterm pipx install cherryterm verify installation: cherryterm version => Cherryterm version: 0.1.2 then follow the rest instruction Demo # https://youtu.be/8QC6vB-UNus
